org.smartfrog.sfcore.common
Class OptionSet

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.OptionSet

public class OptionSet
extends java.lang.Object

Parses the SFSystem arguments into an option set. Options are seperated by optionFlagIndicator characters.

readCfgDescriptorsFile

public static java.util.Vector readCfgDescriptorsFile(java.lang.String fileURL)
                                               throws SmartFrogException
Reads all the lines of a file an tries to parse them as SFACT. It ignores empty lines or lines starting with # or double "//"

Parameters:
fileURL - file to be read
Returns:
the parsed file
Throws:
SmartFrogException - if failed to read
